skills.name: Accurate Shot
skills.description: Attacks accurately with a 30% increased chance of landing a Critical Hit. The inflicted damage is proportionate to the enemy's MAX HP.

skills.name: Poison Arrow
skills.description: Fires two magical arrows, with each hit having a 40% chance to disturb the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns. The enemy can't be revived if the enemy is killed with this skill.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Soul Crush
skills.description: Disturbs HP recovery for 2 turns with arrows that destroy the enemy's soul. The enemy can't be revived if the enemy is killed with this skill.

skill_effect.name: Anti-Revive
skill_effect.description: Prevents an enemy from being resurrected after being killed.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns
